to invigorate the country through science and education

sentences.english: It was designated a world heritage site by UNESCO in 1987.
sentences.chinese: 1987年，联合国科教文组织将它选为世界遗产。

sentences.english: Shaanxi has powerful education of science strength, with high-quality and practical talents.

sentences.english: The school characteristic mainly manifests, in the agricultural science and technology education unifies on.
sentences.chinese: 学校的办学特色主要体现在农科教相结合上。

sentences.english: Science offers us total mastery over environment and over our destiny.
sentences.chinese: 科教付与我们节制环境把握运气的才气。

sentences.english: There is no question that UNESCO can exert a positive influence.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，联合国科教文组织能发挥积极的影响。

sentences.english: Century through science and education in mind, even more powerful and promote development.

Up to now, Simatai Great Wall has been listed by UNESCO into the World Culture Heritages .

sentences.english: Article 6 The State upholds the principles of invigoration of agriculture through science and education and of sustainable development of agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 第六条国家坚持科教兴农和农业可持续发展的方针。

sentences.english: This is our country through science and education strategy for the inevitable demand.
sentences.chinese: 这是我国实施科教兴国战略的必然要求。

sentences.english: Some national authorities resent UNESCO's meddling.
sentences.chinese: 某些国家当局憎恨联合国科教文组织的干预。

sentences.english: However, science communication in our country can be better.
sentences.chinese: 但是，我国科教传播的现状还难以令人满意。

sentences.english: This article sketches out the operating mechanism and systems of the combination.
sentences.chinese: 本文基本勾画出了农科教结合的运行机理和运行机制。

sentences.english: In the paper, the authors also discussed the key successful factors for formulating the action plan.
sentences.chinese: 作者还讨论了制定科教兴医行动方案的成功关键因素。
